org.apache.flink.core.memory

类 DataInputDeserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.memory.DataInputDeserializer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.DataInput, java.io.Serializable, DataInputView

    public class DataInputDeserializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataInputView, java.io.Serializable
    A simple and efficient deserializer for the DataInput interface.
    另请参阅:

      • skipBytesToRead

        public void skipBytesToRead(int numBytes)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataInputView
        Skips numBytes bytes of memory. In contrast to the DataInput.skipBytes(int) method, this method always skips the desired number of bytes or throws an EOFException.
        指定者:
        skipBytesToRead 在接口中 DataInputView
        参数:
        numBytes - The number of bytes to skip.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if any I/O related problem occurred such that the input could not be advanced to the desired position.

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b,
                int off,
                int len)
         throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataInputView
        Reads up to len bytes of memory and stores it into b starting at offset off. It returns the number of read bytes or -1 if there is no more data left.
        指定者:
        read 在接口中 DataInputView
        参数:
        b - byte array to store the data to
        off - offset into byte array
        len - byte length to read
        返回:
        the number of actually read bytes of -1 if there is no more data left
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b)
         throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataInputView
        Tries to fill the given byte array b. Returns the actually number of read bytes or -1 if there is no more data.
        指定者:
        read 在接口中 DataInputView
        参数:
        b - byte array to store the data to
        返回:
        the number of read bytes or -1 if there is no more data left
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
